timeline.message: Set the hazelcastDownloadId to distribution for tar.gz distribution
Add JET_MODULES variable to add jars from opt folder to classpath

timeline.bodyText: https://jet-start.sh/docs/operations/installation is it worth expanding this page as well? right now it doesn't talk so much about how to use built in modules.
timeline.author: cangencer
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -278,6 +278,20 @@ To see the default content of the files run the following command:
 docker run hazelcast/hazelcast-jet cat /opt/hazelcast-jet/config/hazelcast-jet.yaml
 ```
 
+## Use Built-in Modules
